abstract: Two banking analysts, Chris Kotowski of Oppenheimer and Richard X. Bove of Rochdale Securities, are at odds over Mr. Bove’s “sell” rating on Wells Fargo and the reasons behind it.
snippet: Two banking analysts, Chris Kotowski of Oppenheimer and Richard X. Bove of Rochdale Securities, are at odds over Mr. Bove’s “sell” rating on Wells Fargo and the reasons behind it.
lead_paragraph: Richard X. Bove, meet your challenger.

headline.main: Analysts at Odds Over Call on Wells Fargo
